markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=6403) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=262)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=6401)

</column>

---

Your scroll collection has vastly grown, both in size and potency. In addition to your daily scrolls from Basic Scroll Cache, add a scroll with a 3rd-rank spell. At 14th level, add a scroll with a 4th-rank spell. At 16th level, add a scroll with a 5th-rank spell.

<title level="2">Expert Scroll Cache leads to...</title>
[Master Scroll Cache](/Feats.aspx?ID=6404)
name: Expert Scroll Cache
